short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DNS Info Viewer for the current website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DNS Checker Pro is a powerful Chrome extension that provides instant, comprehensive insights about any website you visit. With a single click, you can access crucial domain information right in your browser. This tool is perfect for web developers, IT professionals, digital marketers, and anyone curious about the technical details behind websites.

Key Features:

1-WHOIS Information: Quickly view registration details, including domain owner, registration and expiration dates, and registrar information.

2-DNS Records: Access a full breakdown of DNS records, including A, AAAA, CNAME, MX, NS, SOA, and TXT records, giving you a complete picture of the domain's DNS configuration.

3-MX Records: Easily check mail exchanger records to understand the email setup for the domain.

4-SSL Certificate Details: Get in-depth information about the domain's SSL certificates, including issuer, validity period, and encryption algorithms used.

5-User-Friendly Interface: All information is presented in a clean, easy-to-read format directly in the extension popup.

6-One-Click Access: Simply click on the extension icon while on any website to instantly view its domain information.

7-Link to More Tools: Direct access to additional web tools on HTTPFY.io for further analysis and information.

Whether you're troubleshooting website issues, conducting security assessments, or just satisfying your curiosity about web infrastructure, Domain Information Viewer provides valuable insights at your fingertips. Install now to enhance your browsing experience with instant access to comprehensive domain information!
